Introductionïƒ

Ngeodesic provides safety guardrails for AI with enhanced performance. Our Micro-LM sidecars act as a Layer 2 for AI: improving efficiency and reliability, enforcing determinism, auditability, and compliance â€” all while letting large language models remain fluent and flexible. For GitHub repos, you can visit:

  • NGF Research

Warp->Detect->Denoise (WDD)ïƒ

Warp â†’ Detect â†’ Denoise (WDD) is a patented pipeline for making noisy latent spaces deterministic and auditable. It first warps embeddings into a stable geometry, then detects true signals with calibrated filters, and finally denoises phantom attractors. The result: reproducible PASS/ABSTAIN decisions with clear traces â€” turning stochastic LLM outputs into predictable, safe, enterprise-grade behavior.

Micro-LMsïƒ

Micro-LMs are lightweight, domain-specific companions to LLMs that provide determinism, safety, and auditability. They focus on a narrow set of primitives (e.g., DeFi actions, ARC puzzles), mapping prompts into PASS or ABSTAIN with verifiers and traces. The LLM handles fluency, while the micro-LM enforces guardrails and compliance â€” the best of both worlds.

Micro-LM Sidecarïƒ

A Micro-LM Sidecar can be thought of as a Layer 2 for AI: it doesnâ€™t replace the large language model, but it sits alongside it to improve performance, add safety guardrails, determinism, and auditability. In AI, the LLM is like Layer 1: broad, powerful, but stochastic and sometimes unsafe. A Micro-LM Sidecar is like Layer 2: lightweight, domain-specific, enforcing determinism and safety guardrails, but still â€œanchoredâ€ to the LLMâ€™s fluency and reasoning power.
